reviews.review_msg: Wonderful person, really interesting course esp. readings. A lot of work but work is enjoyable. You really feel u r learning smthg important. U always know exactly what is expected of you. Only complaint: wish she would share more of her knowledge instead of always leaving it to class discussion. Take this course with Chris!

Chris is very intelligent, warm, and approachable. She genuinely cares about her students, and facilites great discussion in lecture and tutorial. If you are interested in the subject, take this class with her.
Easy class that was interessting.....chris was very helpful if you needed it

Professor Jones is one of best profs. The class is pretty easy, she gives you easy quizzes which only test whether u read the material or not, there are no trick questions, etc. Show up to class, take notes, and study her lecture notes for final and you will do fine.
She is interested in what she is teaching. However, she is not very good at teaching it. We spent all of our lectures having discussions so it was hard to know what she would be testing on the final.
Dr. Jones is great.  I hope the finals in future classes are not worth quite as much.

Her first semester at SFU, I think her biggest downfall was adjusting the course content so now we're trying to cover too much stuff in one lecture.  I really like the open talking she encourages and she really knows her stuff.  I think next semester she'll be great once she gets comfortable
